---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update subtask group"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/subtasks/group/{subtaskGroupId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the properties of an existing subtask group, such as its name, description, or visibility settings. Changes apply immediately to all subtasks within the group.

**Prerequisites**
1. **subtaskGroupId** – Use [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-my-subtask-groups) to list your groups and extract `SubtaskGroupId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List groups: [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-my-subtask-groups) → identify group to update
2. Update group: [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/\{subtaskGroupId\}](/docs/api/tickets/update-subtask-group) with new properties
3. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/subtasks/my/groups](/docs/api/tickets/get-my-subtask-groups) to confirm changes

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/new](/docs/api/tickets/create-subtask-group) – Create a new group
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/\{subtaskGroupId\}](/docs/api/tickets/delete-subtask-group) – Delete group
- [POST /api/v1.0/subtasks/group/assign](/docs/api/tickets/assign-subtasks-to-group) – Assign subtasks to group

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"subtaskGroupId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Subtask group identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Subtask group payload.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"User-defined grouping container for ticket subtasks.","properties":{"SubtaskGroupId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Identifier for the subtask group.","example":"33333333-3333-4333-8333-333333333333"},"OwnerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"User identifier that owns the group.","example":"bcaf8610-0a3d-4f08-b1ff-1d951f63d901"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Group name shown in the UI.","example":"Chromebook roll-out"},"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Scope enum value (site, district, etc.) serialized by the API."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product identifier that owns the group.","example":"88df910c-91aa-e711-80c2-0004ffa00010"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site identifier that owns the group.","example":"bb6cece8-e4f4-e511-a789-005056bb000e"},"SubtaskList":{"type":"array","description":"Optional embedded list of subtasks in this group.","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Lightweight list item representing a subtask entry inside a group.","properties":{"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Subtask subject or display name.","example":"Contact requestor for more details"}},"title":"SubtaskGroupListItem"}}},"required":["SubtaskGroupId","OwnerId","Name","ProductId","SiteId"],"title":"SubtaskGroup"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
